medium: Photopolymer prints, embossing and debossing on black handmade paper; morocco cover with nickel clasps
title: Remorse
marks: Signature on last printed page, in pencil: [Cynthia Thompson
description: images in white/grey and embossing of cloths, arms and ears, head veils, and liquid drops interspersed with embossed text on black paper; black leather cover with front and back of cover extending down to form a flap, with a large woven knot of leather at end; two strap closures with silver organic-shaped clasps
creditline: The Mary and Robyn Campbell Fund for Art Books
